definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: My name be buried where my body is.
sentences.chinese: 願我的名字永遠和肉體同埋。

sentences.english: Yeats describes mankind's fleshly predicament as a soul fastened to a dying animal.
sentences.chinese: 描繪了當靈魂依附於瀕死的動物時人類肉體的窘境。

sentences.english: Because,unlike software,which can be literally copied, as many as you want identical,the body can't split.
sentences.chinese: 因爲不同於可被不斷拷貝的軟件，肉體是不能分裂的。

sentences.english: But he is also the entity K. who is the x of this flesh-and-blood equation.
sentences.chinese: 但是他也是實體的K，是這個肉體等式的未知數x。

sentences.english: Intact skin can protect the body from be invaded by germs.
sentences.chinese: 未受損的肌膚沒去外國疑問保護肉體不受細菌侵害。

sentences.english: Souls,just like bodies,just like personalities,can split.
sentences.chinese: 靈魂和肉體還有人格一樣，也能夠分裂。

sentences.english: Every now and then,people's bodies get possessed.
sentences.chinese: 時常有人們肉體被奪舍的事件。

sentences.english: Should divine life be immured in the charnel house of fleshly lust?
sentences.chinese: 聖潔的生活應該埋葬在肉體情慾的墳墓內嗎？

sentences.english: The genetic material then transcribes the thought-form into physicality, which is known as form.
sentences.chinese: 隨後基因材料把思想形態轉錄到肉體性，即形體。

sentences.english: We expose our mortal flesh to the laws of the physical environment around us.
sentences.chinese: 我們使易朽的肉體服從周圍物理環境的法則。

sentences.english: When the body breaks,I cease to exist as a person.
sentences.chinese: 當肉體消亡時，我就不作爲人存在了。

sentences.english: After all,on the body view,I still exist when I'm a corpse.
sentences.chinese: 從肉體理論上來看我作爲屍體時仍然存在。

sentences.english: TheChristian dogma oftheresurrection of the body shows considerable profundity on this point.
sentences.chinese: 基督的肉體復活教義在這點上顯示了相當的深刻性。

sentences.english: So what else can the body theory say?
sentences.chinese: 那肉體理論還有什麼好說的呢？
去吧，靈魂，你這肉體之客。
